name: Rider Xmas Action
description:
Very simple game control yet very exiting to play for people of all ages. Must try to believe it.
Come and meet Santa... Take him to challenging places he has never gone... But dont drop him down...


---------------------------
*** Game Facts ***

Three realistic christmas themes with cool animations makes this game stand apart from rest.

With addictive gameplay and unlimited levels it will never let you down in your boring times.

Awesome rain, snow, wind & lightning effects adds realism.


---------------------------
*** Game Play ***

- Touch the screen to jump.
- Land Santa in Red for "PERFECT" Score.
- Continuous "PERFECT" score will fetch more points.
- Tilt your device to position landing.
- Try to get to top of online Ranking.

You can switch accelerometer ON/OFF in settings screen.
You have two lives in this free version to start with.


---------------------------
*** Features ***

- Very simple control with Option for tilt control.
- Three realisitic themes including snow, forest & land.
- Awesome Rain, Snow, Wind & Lightening special effects.
- Online global Leaderboards with support for GameCenter.
- OpenFeint Leaderboards for devices using IOS 4.0 and below.
- Unlimited Levels with progressive difficulty.
- Seperate local leaderboard with additional details.
- Excellent Scoring system based on yourlanding perfection.
